issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://youtube.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fyoutube.com) ### Comment > Request #783180 > > Hi, we're having issues with youtube no longer giving us the option to see the description boxes within videos. We have family dns enabled to block ads...however we have not had issues with this until a few days ago after new iPhone update. We are running latest updates on iPhone, adguard, and safari. Issues are all when adguard enabled only. When you select "more" at bottom of youtube video, description box pops up, however the description does not come up any longer. This happens on different videos that I know have descriptions available for viewing. Running ios 16.5.1(c) > If I turn adguard off in safari under settings and through the app, then YouTube descriptions are visible. For some reason, they are no longer visible when you select "more" in a YouTube video underneath the video if adguard is enabled. I'm unable to see the Video description or links in youtube if adguard is on. This did not happen before latest ios update. I have provided two photos for examples. When you click on "more" the description and links will normally pop up for you to view, however, if I have adguard enabled the descriptions no longer pop up for viewing. I have attached a photo to show adguard enabled, and you cannot see the description, and then a screenshot with AdGuard disabled, and you can then see the description like we slways had been able to say with our family DNS filtering in YouTube has blocked. This was never an issue before the latest iOS update. We want to continue to have the ability to use AdGuard without having to disable it to view YouTube descriptions. > please help, thank you...Charlene ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/9cfu2ugqlh4wso4gcoscg4ws0w4oooshvdkabcuw2o.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/2awqi6e2z3i8soggcg8440k04sgs0o0pitsb515gyo.jpg?nc=1)

issue.title: northerntool.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

none

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.northerntool.com/products/red-mountain-valley-patio-mat-6ft-x-9ft-palm-leaf-pattern-model-2a-pm013-104586

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

I have the AdGuard Tracking Protection filter list enabled in ublock origin. This causes the northerntool.com site to not load at all. I reported it in the ublock github and they said it was caused specifically by AdGuard Tracking Protection filter
`||qoe-*.yottaa.net/*/configure.rapid.js`

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: northerntool.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

none

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.northerntool.com/products/red-mountain-valley-patio-mat-6ft-x-9ft-palm-leaf-pattern-model-2a-pm013-104586

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

I have the AdGuard Tracking Protection filter list enabled in ublock origin. This causes the northerntool.com site to not load at all. I reported it in the ublock github and they said it was caused specifically by 
`||qoe-*.yottaa.net/*/configure.rapid.js`

Disabling the AdGuard Tracking Protection filter makes the site load properly
### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
